char* strtek P2 (  (str, sep)  ,
char *  str,
char *  sep
) 
  

00035                                                      {
00036 
00037     static char     * S = (char *)0;
00038     char        * c, * base;
00039 
00040     if (str) S = str;
00041 
00042     if (!S || !*S) return (char *)0;
00043 
00044     /*  Skip delimiters.
00045      */
00046     while (*S) {
00047         for (c = sep; *c && *c != *S; c++) ;
00048         if (*c) *S++ = 0;
00049         else break;
00050     }
00051 
00052     base = S;
00053 
00054     /*   Skip non-delimiters.
00055      */
00056     for (base = S; *S; S++) {
00057 
00058         for (c = sep; *c; c++)
00059             if (*c == *S) {
00060                 *S++ = 0;
00061                 return base;
00062             }
00063     }
00064 
00065     return base == S ? (char *)0 : base;
00066 }
